Package org.jhotdraw.samples.odg

A sample drawing editor with limited support for the OASIS Open Document Drawing 1.1 (ODG) file format as used by Open Office.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Gradient Represents an SVG Gradient.
 

Class Summary
Main Main.
ODGApplicationModel ODGApplicationModel.
ODGAttributeKeys ODGAttributeKeys.

ODGDrawing ODGDrawing.
ODGDrawingPanel ODGDrawingPanel.
ODGDrawingPanelBeanInfo  
ODGPropertiesPanel The ODGPropertiesPanel allows to edit properties (attributes and other things) of a ODGFigure.
ODGPropertiesPanelBeanInfo BeanInfo for SVGPropertiespanel.
ODGView A view for ODG drawings.
PathTool Tool to scribble a ODGPath

ODGConstants.FillStyle  
ODGConstants.StrokeStyle  
 

Package org.jhotdraw.samples.odg Description

A sample drawing editor with limited support for the OASIS Open Document Drawing 1.1 (ODG) file format as used by Open Office.
